description: Returns a list of anomaly groups.

parameters.name: AnomalyDetectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the anomaly detector.

parameters.name: SensitivityThreshold
parameters.description: The minimum severity score for inclusion in the output.

nested_items.name: AnomalyGroupSummaryList
nested_items.description: A list of anomaly group summaries.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time for the group.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The end time for the group.

nested_items.name: AnomalyGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the anomaly group.

nested_items.name: AnomalyGroupScore
nested_items.description: The severity score of the group.

nested_items.name: PrimaryMetricName
nested_items.description: The name of the primary affected measure for the group.

nested_items.name: AnomalyGroupStatistics
nested_items.description: Aggregated details about the anomaly groups.

nested_items.name: EvaluationStartDate
nested_items.description: The start of the time range that was searched.

nested_items.name: ItemizedMetricStatsList
nested_items.description: Statistics for individual metrics within the group.

nested_items.name: OccurrenceCount
nested_items.description: The number of times that the measure appears.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token that's included if more results are available.
